name: HoloFuel

scripts.start-dna-agent2: cd ./holofuel && HC_N3H_BOOTSTRAP_NODE=wss://192.168.0.7:32985/?a=hkb-5jhpAEnHUB7BFqGKh8sJeGFuBb7wXue5xj_HSLY_yNIEUlgj4uCUT7DjKv58rbpjy2K4f4ZrQjvLsxPbZMIco-kOFDgK HC_N3H_IPC_URI=wss://127.0.0.1:34159/ HC_N3H_PATH=/home/lisa/n3h HC_AGENT=testAgent2 hc run --port 3100
